reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Training and capacity development of municipal staff in Libya

description.narrative: L'iniziativa intende contribuire a migliorare le condizioni di vita della popolazione in alcune Municipalità libiche, facilitando il loro accesso ai servizi di base.

This initiative is designed to improve access to essential services for local communities in Libya, by strengthening the technical, managerial and organizational capacities of the municipalities and by fostering a culture of inclusive policy-making and service delivery at local level.

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management

tag.narrative: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels
Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
